pageHeader.subtitle: >- A personal training application based on a digital deck of cards. Randomized workouts were presented through card-like digital screens.
pageHeader.description: > Fit-Deck was a mobile application derived from a physical deck of cards. The deck's purpose was to randomize your workout by selecting cards from a deck that would give you a series of physical activities to do.  The application timed and tracked your performance and gave you recommendations for further improvement.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
